---
title: "Active Sidelying Piriformis Test"
keywords:
    - Active Piriformis Test
---


- Patient positioned in contralateral sidelying (test hip upward) with bent knees and slight hip flexion [@aptaCurrentConceptsOrthopaedic2024]
- Clinician palpates the piriformis muscle [@aptaCurrentConceptsOrthopaedic2024]
- Patient performs isometric hip abduction + ER against examiner resistance [@aptaCurrentConceptsOrthopaedic2024]


- Positive
  - Provocation at point of palpation [@aptaCurrentConceptsOrthopaedic2024]
  - Radiating pain [@aptaCurrentConceptsOrthopaedic2024]
